channel.title: episode guide on Bucket's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in episode guide on Bucket's Notes

item.title: TNG guide
item.description: Season 1 # Encounter at Farpoint # Not Good, but it introduces everyone and Q Watch until you cant stand it anymore 2/10 The Naked Now # Not Good, but not a nope either. Data gets his funk on 3/10 Code of Honor # NOPE (unless you Really Really like Tasha) 0/10 The Last Outpost # Introduces the ferengi in their TNG conception 4/10 Where No One Has Gone Before # The traveller is cute, wesley is annoying, the concept is alright
